metadata.title: SUSE-SU-2014:0155-1 -- Security update for puppet
metadata.description:
This update for puppet fixes a remote code execution vulnerability in the "resource_type" service. (CVE-2013-4761)
Additionally, the update prevents puppet from executing initialization scripts that could trigger a system reboot when handling "puppet resource service" calls.
Security Issue reference:
* CVE-2013-4761 <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2013-4761 >
